items.sentence: Are you telling me that you\'ve never been to Boston?
I thought you\'d be full after eating that big steak.
I don\'t think Tom should be the captain of our team.
Why don\'t you pull over and take a rest for a while?
Tom knew that Mary told John to ask Alice to do that.
Tom left for Boston as soon as he got the phone call.
Tom left his hometown for college and never returned.
Tom likes to work in the garden before going to work.
Tom doesn\'t have to go there if he doesn\'t want to.
She knelt beside him and asked him what his name was.
